Test Case: Request verification code with valid email
Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter registered Learnworlds email
3. Click "Send Verification Code"
Expected Result: Step transitions to code input; success message "Verification code sent to your email"; 6-digit code emailed

Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter unregistered email
3. Click Send
Expected Result: Error: "This email is not registered as a MojiTax member"

Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter suspended account email
3. Click Send
Expected Result: Error: "Your MojiTax account is suspended. Please contact support."

Steps:
1. Enter the 6-digit code from email
2. Submit
Expected Result: Success: "Login successful! Redirecting..."; redirected to /; JWT session cookie set

Steps:
1. Enter an incorrect 6-digit code
2. Submit
Expected Result: Error: "Invalid or expired verification code. Please request a new code."

Pre-conditions: Code requested more than 10 min ago
Steps:
1. Wait 10+ minutes after requesting code
2. Enter the code
3. Submit
Expected Result: Error: code expired; prompted to request new code

Steps: 1. Click "Resend code"
Expected Result: New code sent to same email; previous code invalidated

Steps: 1. Click "Use different email"
Expected Result: Returns to email input step

Steps:
1. Try typing letters or special characters
2. Try pasting more than 6 digits
Expected Result: Only numeric input accepted; max 6 characters

Steps: 1. Click Connect link from Learnworlds platform
Expected Result: User created/updated in DB; JWT cookie set; auto-enrolled in linked channels; redirected to /

Steps: 1. Click logout button
Expected Result: Session cookie cleared; redirected to home page

Test Case: Set display name on first login
Pre-conditions: New member; no display name set
Steps:
1. Log in for the first time
2. Observe blue banner: "Set your display name"
Expected Result: Blue banner appears at top with input field and Save button

Steps:
1. Enter display name (2-30 chars, letters/numbers/spaces/hyphens/underscores)
2. Click Save
Expected Result: Display name saved; banner dismissed; page reloads with name visible

Steps:
1. Enter name with special characters (e.g. @#$%)
2. Click Save
Expected Result: Validation error shown

Steps: 1. Click "Skip"
Expected Result: Banner dismissed; no display name set (can set later)

Steps: 1. Navigate to /
Expected Result: ChatLayout in public view: topic channels visible in sidebar; "Sign In to Participate" prompt

Steps: 1. Click a topic channel
Expected Result: Messages visible but input area shows "Sign in with your MojiTax account to join the conversation"

Steps: 1. View right sidebar
Expected Result: Shows "X members online" count but individual names are hidden

Steps: 1. Click "Sign In" button
Expected Result: Redirected to /login page

Steps: 1. Look at left sidebar
Expected Result: Collapsible "Topic Channels" section lists all public channels

Steps: 1. Click on a channel name in sidebar
Expected Result: Messages load (newest 50); message input shown at bottom; channel highlighted in sidebar

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; channel selected
Steps:
1. Type a message in input
2. Press Enter or click Send
Expected Result: Message appears in channel immediately; visible to other users in real-time

Steps:
1. Type some text
2. Press Shift+Enter
3. Type more text
4. Press Enter to send
Expected Result: Message sent with line break preserved

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; another user sends a message
Steps:
1. Have another user send a message in the same channel
2. Observe your screen
Expected Result: New message appears instantly without page refresh

Steps:
1. Be on Channel A
2. Have someone send a message in Channel B
3. Look at sidebar
Expected Result: Channel B shows red unread count badge

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; channel has unread badge
Steps: 1. Click on channel with unread badge
Expected Result: Unread badge clears; messages marked as read

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; channel has 50+ messages
Steps: 1. Scroll up in message list
Expected Result: Older messages load (pagination)

Steps: 1. Attempt to type and send a message
Expected Result: Error: "Your account has been suspended. You cannot send messages."

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; group is suspended
Steps:
1. Navigate to suspended group
2. Attempt to send message
Expected Result: Error: "This group has been suspended by an administrator."

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; other users online
Steps: 1. Look at right sidebar (or members panel)
Expected Result: List of online users with green status indicators

Steps:
1. Have another user log in
2. Observe online users list
Expected Result: New user appears in online list in real-time

Steps:
1. Have another user close their browser
2. Observe online users list
Expected Result: User disappears from online list

Steps: 1. Look at header area
Expected Result: Clock shows current time in Sydney, Tokyo, London, New York

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; same channel as another user
Steps: 1. Have another user start typing in the channel
Expected Result: Typing indicator shown: "[User] is typing..."

Steps:
1. Have the other user stop typing
2. Wait 2 seconds
Expected Result: Typing indicator disappears

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; another user in same channel
Steps:
1. Start typing in a channel
2. Check other user's screen
Expected Result: Other user sees your typing indicator

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; in a channel
Steps: 1. Type "@" in message input
Expected Result: Dropdown appears showing @moji and channel members with display names

Steps: 1. Type "@mo"
Expected Result: Dropdown filters to matching names (e.g. @moji)

Steps:
1. Type "@"
2. Click or select @moji
Expected Result: @moji inserted into message; on send, bot response triggered

Steps:
1. Type "@"
2. Select a user from dropdown
Expected Result: User mention inserted into message

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; dropdown open
Steps:
1. Use Arrow Up/Down to navigate
2. Press Enter or Tab to select
3. Press Escape to dismiss
Expected Result: Navigation, selection, and dismissal work correctly

Steps:
1. Trigger @mention dropdown
2. Check list
Expected Result: Only users with display names appear (privacy protection)

Steps:
1. Type "@moji what is capital gains tax?" in a channel
2. Send
Expected Result: Bot response appears as a bot message with distinct styling

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; @moji message sent
Steps:
1. Send @moji message
2. Observe chat
Expected Result: Thinking/loading indicator shown while bot generates response

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; KB has matching entry
Steps: 1. Ask @moji a question matching a KB entry
Expected Result: Bot provides confident answer sourced from knowledge base

Steps: 1. Ask @moji an obscure or unsupported question
Expected Result: Bot gives low-confidence response with suggestion to talk to a human

Steps:
1. Type "@moji I want to talk to a human"
2. Send
Expected Result: Bot responds with escalation message; support ticket auto-created

Steps: 1. Send a regular message without @moji
Expected Result: Bot does not respond; message appears as normal user message

Steps:
1. Click "Create Group"
2. Enter name and description
3. Select "Public"
4. Click Create
Expected Result: Group created; creator added as owner; group appears in sidebar

Steps:
1. Click "Create Group"
2. Enter name and description
3. Select "Private"
4. Click Create
Expected Result: Group created; modal shows invite code with copy button

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; private group created
Steps: 1. Click "Copy" next to invite code
Expected Result: Code copied to clipboard; toast confirmation

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; have valid invite code
Steps:
1. Enter invite code in join group field
2. Submit
Expected Result: User added as member; group appears in "My Groups" sidebar section

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; member of at least one group
Steps: 1. Look at sidebar
Expected Result: Collapsible "My Groups" section shows all joined groups

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; member of a group
Steps:
1. Select group from sidebar
2. Type and send message
Expected Result: Message appears in group; visible to all group members

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; in a group
Steps:
1. Open group context menu
2. Click "View Members"
Expected Result: Modal shows member list with roles (owner/member)

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; member but not owner
Steps:
1. Open group context menu
2. Click "Leave Group"
3. Confirm in dialog
Expected Result: User removed from group; group disappears from sidebar

Steps:
1. Open group context menu
2. Attempt to leave
Expected Result: Error: "Owner cannot leave. Transfer ownership or archive the group."

Steps:
1. Open group context menu
2. Click "Close Group"
3. Confirm
Expected Result: Group archived; all members lose access

Steps:
1. Click "View Members"
2. Click remove icon next to a member
3. Confirm
Expected Result: Member removed from group

Steps:
1. Click "View Members"
2. Enter email of user to invite
3. Submit
Expected Result: User found and added to group

Steps: 1. Click "Chat with Team MojiTax" in sidebar
Expected Result: Support welcome screen with @moji greeting and "Start New Conversation" button

Steps: 1. Click "Start New Conversation"
Expected Result: @moji chat begins; greeting: "Hi! I'm @moji..."

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; conversation started
Steps:
1. Type a question
2. Send
Expected Result: AI response generated; conversation history maintained

Steps: 1. Ask questions until @moji flags shouldEscalate
Expected Result: Yellow card: "Would you like to speak with a human team member?"

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; escalation card shown
Steps: 1. Click "Connect with Team MojiTax"
Expected Result: Support ticket created with @moji conversation as context; view transitions to ticket thread

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; after first @moji message
Steps: 1. Click "Talk to a human instead" link
Expected Result: Same escalation flow; ticket created directly

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; previous tickets exist
Steps: 1. Look at conversation list
Expected Result: Cards showing ticket subject, status (Open/In Progress/Closed), last message date

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; ticket exists
Steps: 1. Click on a previous conversation
Expected Result: Full message thread loads; user and admin messages visually distinct

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; open ticket selected
Steps:
1. Type reply
2. Send
Expected Result: Message sent; real-time update; message appears in thread

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; closed ticket selected
Steps: 1. Open a closed ticket
Expected Result: Reply input hidden; message "This conversation has been closed" shown with "Start a new conversation" link

Steps:
1. Open support chat
2. Check availability display
Expected Result: Shows "Online - ~Xmin response" (during hours) or "Offline - HH:MM-HH:MM (timezone)" (outside hours)

Steps: 1. Attempt to start a support conversation
Expected Result: Error: "Your account has been suspended"

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; ticket open
Steps:
1. Have admin reply to your ticket
2. Observe support chat
Expected Result: New admin message appears instantly without refresh

Steps: 1. Click search icon in header
Expected Result: Search dialog opens; cursor auto-focused on input

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; search open
Steps: 1. Type 1 character
Expected Result: Message: "Type at least 2 characters to search"

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; messages exist
Steps:
1. Type 2+ characters that match message content
2. Check Messages tab
Expected Result: Results show matching messages with user name, channel name, date, highlighted search terms

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; posts exist
Steps:
1. Type 2+ characters matching post content
2. Check Posts tab
Expected Result: Results show matching posts with type icon/badge, title, content preview, author

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; search results shown
Steps: 1. Click on a message result
Expected Result: Dialog closes; navigates to that channel; message highlighted/scrolled into view

Steps: 1. Perform a search
Expected Result: Tabs show "Messages (N)" and "Posts (N)" with counts

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; not a member of some private channels
Steps: 1. Search for content in a private channel you are not a member of
Expected Result: Private channel messages do NOT appear in your results

Steps: 1. Type quickly in search box
Expected Result: Search does not fire on every keystroke; results appear after 300ms pause

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; articles exist
Steps: 1. Click "View All" on Articles section in sidebar
Expected Result: CategoryLibrary dialog opens with post type title and total count

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; events exist
Steps: 1. Click "View All" on Events section
Expected Result: Events listed with date, location, title

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; announcements exist
Steps: 1. Click "View All" on Announcements
Expected Result: Announcements listed with priority indicator

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; newsletters exist
Steps: 1. Click "View All" on Newsletters
Expected Result: Newsletters listed with title and date

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; category dialog open
Steps: 1. Type in search field within dialog
Expected Result: Results filtered by search term (debounced 300ms)

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; dialog open
Steps: 1. Change sort option
Expected Result: Posts reorder accordingly

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; more than 10 posts
Steps: 1. Click Next/Previous page buttons
Expected Result: Page changes; page X of Y shown; 10 items per page

Steps: 1. Look at right sidebar
Expected Result: Shows latest 3 items per category (Articles, Events, etc.)

Steps: 1. Navigate to /events/:id/interest
Expected Result: Public event page with details (title, date, location, content) and interest form

Steps:
1. Enter name (required)
2. Enter email (required)
3. Optionally enter phone, company, notes
4. Submit
Expected Result: Success: "Thank You!" confirmation displayed; RSVP recorded

Steps: 1. Submit interest with same email for same event
Expected Result: Error: "You have already indicated interest in this event"

Steps: 1. Navigate to /events/invalid-id/interest
Expected Result: "Event not found" message displayed

Steps:
1. Request verification code
2. Check email inbox
Expected Result: Email received with 6-digit code, MojiTax branding, 10-min expiry note

Steps:
1. Admin publishes announcement to your channel
2. Check email inbox
Expected Result: Email received with announcement title, content, "View on Connect" button

Steps:
1. Admin publishes event to your channel
2. Check email inbox
Expected Result: Email received with event details and "Indicate Interest" button

Steps:
1. Admin publishes article to your channel
2. Check email inbox
Expected Result: Email received with article summary, tags, "Read Full Article" button

Steps:
1. Admin publishes newsletter to your channel
2. Check email inbox
Expected Result: Email received with newsletter content, "Read on Connect" button

Pre-conditions: Admin replies to or closes ticket
Steps:
1. Admin replies to your support ticket
2. Check email inbox
Expected Result: Email received with ticket subject, status, latest message

Steps: 1. Admin sends confirmation for event you RSVPd to
Expected Result: Email received with event details and confirmation

Steps: 1. Admin sends reminder for upcoming event
Expected Result: Reminder email received with event details

Steps: 1. Click theme toggle button
Expected Result: Theme switches between dark and light; persisted across refresh

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; on mobile/narrow screen
Steps: 1. Click hamburger menu button
Expected Result: Sidebar slides in; click again or click outside to close

Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; wide screen
Steps: 1. View on wide (XL) screen
Expected Result: Three columns visible: sidebar, main chat, right sidebar (online users / posts)

Test Case: Right sidebar hidden on small screens
Pre-conditions: Logged in as member; narrow screen
Steps: 1. View on smaller screen
Expected Result: Right sidebar hidden; main chat and left sidebar take full width

Steps: 1. Navigate to /terms
Expected Result: Terms of Service content renders correctly

Steps: 1. Navigate to /privacy
Expected Result: Privacy Policy content renders correctly

Steps: 1. Navigate to /nonexistent-page
Expected Result: NotFound page renders with navigation options

Steps:
1. Open platform in two browser tabs
2. Send message in Tab 1
3. Check Tab 2
Expected Result: Message appears in both tabs; user shown as single online user (not duplicated)

Steps:
1. Close browser
2. Re-open browser and navigate to /
Expected Result: Still logged in (JWT cookie persists); no re-login required

Steps: 1. Log in as member with Learnworlds-enrolled courses
Expected Result: Automatically added to channels linked to your Learnworlds courses
